      • aclIsFile

        public boolean aclIsFile(java.lang.Object ctx,
                         java.lang.String[] params)
        Tell whether a file is a directory.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Our current context, containing a crid or cfid.
        params - The parameters containing a config revision id or nothing.
        Returns:
        whether the found revision is a file.

      • aclConfigChannelEditable

        public boolean aclConfigChannelEditable(java.lang.Object ctx,
                                        java.lang.String[] params)
        Tell whether the logged in user can edit the give channel.
        Parameters:
        ctx - Our current context, containing the user
        params - The parameters containing a config channel id.
        Returns:
        whether the config channel and objects inside it are editable by the current user.

      • aclConfigChannelType

        public boolean aclConfigChannelType(java.lang.Object ctx,
                                    java.lang.String[] params)
        Whether the config channel of the current context is of the given type. The possible types are the labels of the different ConfigChannelType statics found in com.redhat.rhn.domain.config.ConfigurationFactory.
        Parameters:
        ctx - The current context.
        params - The params, must include desired channel type label.
        Returns:
        Whether the current channel is of the given type.

      • aclConfigChannelHasFiles

        public boolean aclConfigChannelHasFiles(java.lang.Object ctx,
                                        java.lang.String[] params)
        Tell whether the config channel represented by a ccid in the current context has files.
        Parameters:
        ctx - The current context
        params - The parameters unused.
        Returns:
        whether the config channel has files.

      • aclConfigChannelHasSystems

        public boolean aclConfigChannelHasSystems(java.lang.Object ctx,
                                          java.lang.String[] params)
        Tell us whether the selected channel has any subscribed systems or not
        Parameters:
        ctx - Current context
        params - parameters (unused)
        Returns:
        true if there is at least one system subscribed to this channel

      • aclConfigEnabled

        public boolean aclConfigEnabled(java.lang.Object ctx,
                                java.lang.String[] params)
        Check if a System is config enabled
        Parameters:
        ctx - Context Map to pass in
        params - Parameters to use to fetch from Context
        Returns:
        true if system is config enabled, false otherwise
